name: PeopleSoft: Avoid specific visual design for grid
associatedValueName: Reason of the specific design: either 'ShowBorder' or/and 'ShowGridLines' or/and 'Column headings'.
description:
Grid properties shoul be:
"Show Border" checked (on)
"Show Grid Lines" unchecked (off)
"Column headings" checked (on)
output: This report lists all the PeopleSoft Grids having a specific visual design.
rationale: Improve look & feel for the user
